subject: installation problem
msgSnippet: I have set up junit3.7 on NT4.0 as per the instructions, making sure that my classpath includes junit.jar and the installation directory. When I run any of the
messageBody:
I have set up junit3.7 on NT4.0 as per the instructions, making sure that my classpath includes junit.jar and the installation directory. When I run any of the TestRunners I get the same message "could not invoke the suite() method" and am unable to run junit.samples.AllTests.
 
Can anyone tell me what I have missed?
